tool_description: Email Proofer. Leverage this email validation API to inspect and remove invalid email addresses from your list. This API can additionally answer if a provided email address is using a disposable or free email provider. Just call the endpoints and reduce your bounce rates instantly.
name: Email Proofer
title: Email Proofer

api_list.name: Verify deliverable
api_list.description: Takes in email address as input and returns if deliverable

api_list.name: Check Disposable
api_list.description: Takes email as input and responds with if email is disposable.
